results.summary: Wholesale business-to-business importer of computer and electronic components
highlights: Assumed role of primary Technology Liason, facilitating technical communications with various internal teams
Increased speed of order process by 30% through developing ETL atuomation while working alongside Senior Programmer Analyst

Eliminated over 50% of warehouse-related errors by spearheading collaborative efforts to streamline logistics, and developing scripts for ad-hoc data analysis, inventory management, and order issue tracking

results.summary: Full-service IT company providing remote and on-site services to corporate and private clientele throughout Central Jersey
Online fashion social commerce platform with data-driven approach to fit and style
highlights: Wireframed and engineered intuitive, platform-agnostic, responsive user interface components to replace plain form elements
Identified and implemented key UI/UX design principles for increasing user retention and reducing bounce rates
Assisted back-end development team in resolving OmniAuth-related issues and updating Facebook and Instagram user authentication to current specifications
Collaborated with marketing team in creating landing pages with multivariate and A/B testing for purposes of lead generation and user acquisition
Proposed adoption of development best practices, including Ruby and Javascript style guides and modular Sass architecture
Adapted user interface components from Ionic mobile application for desktop site

results.summary: Social media analytics dashboard for Snapchat influencer marketing
highlights: Collaborated with Agile engineering team in developing features and fixing bugs on single-page web application

Resolved major date search filter issue by writing Angular service to serialise HTTP request parameters, refactoring server-side code to address timezone offsets, and altering MySQL table schema for consistency amongst date columns

Designed feature to display fully-responsive video and image embeds from user’s social media account posts by automatically querying Facebook, YouTube, and/or Twitter APIs with parameters retrieved from database

Proposed adopting alternative data visualisation libraries through research and analysis of D3.js and Chart.js based implementations, evaluating feasibility with regards to compatibility and application requirements
